de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.flwr.util
Class XTMConverter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.flwr.util.XTMConverter

public class XTMConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to transform topic map fragments to XML or parse XTM fragments an create the corresponding topic map fragment.

The class internal use the XTM20TopicMapReader and XTM20TopicMapWriter.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Detail

toTopicMap

public static org.tmapi.core.TopicMap toTopicMap(java.lang.String xtm,
                                                 org.tmapi.core.TopicMapSystem tms)
                                          throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method transform the given XTM fragment to the corresponding topic map fragment. The method parse the given XTM string with the XTM20TopicMapReader and create a new instance of TopicMap by using the given topic map system.

Parameters:
xtm - the XTM fragment
tms - the topic map system used to create a new topic map
Returns:
the new topic map fragment and never null
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if XTM parsing fails

toXTMString

public static java.lang.String toXTMString(java.util.Collection<?> values)
                                    throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method transform the given topic map items to the corresponding XTM fragment. The method serialize the given topic map with the XTM20TopicMapWriter.

Parameters:
values - set containing all values to convert to XTM
Returns:
the string-represented XTM-fragment
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if items can not be serialized

getReplacement

private static final java.lang.String getReplacement(java.lang.Object value)
                                              throws TMQLRuntimeException
Internal method which transform the given value of the matches to their XML-string-representation.

If value is a topic, the XTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an occurrence, the XTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an name, the XTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is an association, the XTM-specific pattern will be returned.

If value is a sequence, the method will called incremental for each element

If value is an atom, the string-representation will be returned.

Parameters:
value - the value to transform
Returns:
the XTM-string-representation
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if serialization fails

cleanXTM2

private static java.lang.String cleanXTM2(java.lang.String xtm2)
Method cleans the serialized XTM-string representation of the topic map by removing the XTM-head information from the XML file.

Parameters:
xtm2 - the XTM-20 content
Returns:
the cleaned XTM content
